Featured Cones






New
















Description
Features and Benefits

Description








Now here's a Special Edition DRUMSTICK flavour that has only one reaction: "MMM!". NESTLÉ DRUMSTICK Special Edition Toffee Graham Crunch Frozen Dessert Cones is an elevated take on our Caramel Classic. It combines a crisp wafer cone with creamy vanilla frozen dessert and a caramel core with an exclusive toffee coating, topped with buttery graham pieces, the perfect way to delight your taste buds. Proudly crafted in London, Ontario with Canadian dairy. 










Features and Benefits












Crisp wafer cones filled with creamy vanilla and caramel core, topped with delicious toffee coating and buttery graham pieces






Creamy and tasty, made with Canadian dairy. We are proud to support the Canadian dairy industry!






DRUMSTICK has been THE ORIGINAL SUNDAE CONE since 1928

We want to be transparent about the data we and our partners collect and how we use it.

We and our partners use 1st and 3rd party cookies (or similar) in order to enhance your overall web browsing experience, measure our audience, collect useful information to allow us and our partners to provide you with ads tailored to your interests, and permit you to share content on social media.

Always Active
These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
Cookies Details‎
Performance Cookies
 
 
Performance Cookies
 
These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.
Cookies Details‎
Functional Cookies
 
 
Functional Cookies
 
These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.
Cookies Details‎
Targeting Cookies
 
 
Targeting Cookies
 
These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
Cookies Details‎
Social Media Cookies
 
 
Social Media Cookies
 
These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.

Minis
















Description
Features and Benefits

Description








The creamy, crunchy, classic Simply Dipped Chocolate DRUMSTICK now comes in a mini-sized treat. DRUMSTICK Minis Simply Dipped Chocolate 6-Pack doubles the chocolate flavour featuring a creamy-tasting frozen chocolatey dessert dipped in our rich, signature chocolatey dip. Made with dairy from Canadian cows, this 6-Pack is smaller in size, but just as big in taste that is sure to excite your buds and tastebuds alike. Raise your cone to DRUMSTICK goodness!










Features and Benefits












Frozen treat with creamy-tasting chocolatey dessert dipped in chocolatey coating






120 calories per cone (63 ml)






Dairy from Canadian cows






No artificial colours* or flavours






DRUMSTICK has been THE ORIGINAL SUNDAE CONE® for over 80 years

, as found on our Cookie Notice page, to see a complete list of these technologies and to tell us whether they can be used on your device.

Accept All Cookies
Cookie Consent Tool
Information we collect about you
We want to be transparent about the data we and our partners collect and how we use it.

We and our partners use 1st and 3rd party cookies (or similar) in order to enhance your overall web browsing experience, measure our audience, collect useful information to allow us and our partners to provide you with ads tailored to your interests, and permit you to share content on social media.

Some cookies can be deactivated by clicking on the "Decline" button below. You may modify your choices at any time; for more information, please see our privacy policy.
            
Privacy Policy
Allow All
 Manage Consent Preferences
Strictly Necessary Cookies
Always Active
These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
Cookies Details‎
Performance Cookies
 
 
Performance Cookies
 
These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.
Cookies Details‎
Functional Cookies
 
 
Functional Cookies
 
These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.
Cookies Details‎
Targeting Cookies
 
 
Targeting Cookies
 
These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
Cookies Details‎
Social Media Cookies
 
 
Social Media Cookies
 
These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.
Cookies Details‎

 How can I receive Nestlé Canada coupons and samples? 
 
 Wednesday, March 05, 2025 
 
If you need to advise us of a product safety or concern, click here
 
 
 Visit madewithnestle.ca to sign up for our exclusive Nestlé Canada e-newsletter 


We hear you! We love a good coupon or free sample, too.


While we don’t always have product available for giveaways, here are a few options that you might want to explore:


Nestlé Canada e-newsletter: 


CLICK HERE
 to sign up for our exclusive Nestlé Canada e-newsletter, where you can find out about special offers on Nestlé products, contests, prizes, event invitations and of course – coupons.   


Nestlé Baby & me program: 


We are pleased to introduce the 
Updated Nestlé Baby & me Program
 where you sign-up to enjoy access to expert guidance, helpful tools, regular product updates, customized support and a chance to win a $100 gift card. Click 
here
 to join today. 


Note that Nestlé announced the sale of the Good Start® Infant Formula business in Canada and the U.S. to Perrigo Company. While Good Start® infant formula products themselves remain the same, the Nestlé Baby & me program has evolved and will no longer be offering any benefits or coupons related to Good Start® infant formula.  


To get access to Good Start® infant formula coupons, baby feeding advice, and more, you can sign-up for the new Good Start™ Baby Club program* here: 
https://goodstartbaby.ca/account/register?return_url=%2Faccount
  


Social Media:  


One of the best ways to stay informed on our latest contests, promotions and giveaways is through our social media channels. Follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. 


Nestlé Affiliates: 


We also recommend you try checking for promotions through partners we frequently work with: 






save.ca
 for current promotions from your favourite grocery retailer 






Checkout 51
, a free cash back app that we often partner with for many of our products.  






 
SampleSource.com
 (Check for any ongoing promotions and choose which samples you would like to receive)  






Sampler
 (New product samples and promotions from time to time) 






Nestlé Purina:  


Moreover, you may also visit 
https://www.purina.ca/coupons
 for Purina coupons. 


 
Note:
 Additionally, we recommend to that you check your local grocery store for in-store promotions, and coupons. 


*The Good StartTM Baby Club program is operated by Perrigo Company.

10 Foods that Give You Energy

Nestlé Canadas Nesquik proudly sponsors the FirstEver National Make Happy Tummies Campaign

Make Happy Tummies
 campaign (formerly Toonies for Tummies)!














 






 










Pay Attention to Protein at Breakfast




If your idea of breakfast is a cup of coffee, you may want to rethink your morning meal. We’ve all heard the saying that 
breakfast
 is the most important meal of the day, but why?














 






 










6 Tips to Help Support the Immune Support




Your immune system is like your body’s personal security force, protecting you from intruders such as bacteria and viruses. When your immune system encounters these germs, it needs to be strong enough to stop and attack them before they can harm you or make you ill.

EXTRÄAZ Key Lime Pie Ice Cream




Indulge in HÄAGEN-DAZS EXTRÄAZ Key Lime Pie ice cream—a delightful mix of creamy, sweet, and tangy key lime ice cream swirled with a graham cracker ripple, offering a satisfyingly crumbly and crunchy texture that's the ultimate indulgence. Since 1960, HÄAGEN-DAZS has been committed to taking high quality ingredients and transforming them into extraordinary ice cream.














 


 














VANILLA MILK ICE CREAM BARS




Indulge in the irresistible taste of HÄAGEN-DAZS Vanilla Milk Chocolate Ice Cream Bars (3 x 88 ml). Since 1960, our passion has taken us on a journey to transform only the finest ingredients into a simply extraordinary ice cream experience. To create these delicious ice cream bars, we dip our smooth vanilla ice cream in a rich coating made with HÄAGEN-DAZS chocolate.














 


 














COFFEE MATE AFTER EIGHT Liquid Coffee Enhancer




Take your coffee to the next level with the delicious, chocolatey and minty cool COFFEE MATE AFTER EIGHT Liquid Coffee Enhancer (828 ml). Just add a dash of the perfectly balanced taste of classic dark chocolate with a cooling natural mint flavour to transform every cup of coffee into a deliciously creamy treat – not too heavy and not too sweet.

HÄAGENDAZS Vanilla Milk Ice Cream Bars 3 x 88mL




Indulge in the irresistible taste of HÄAGEN-DAZS Vanilla Milk Chocolate Ice Cream Bars (3 x 88 ml). Since 1960, our passion has taken us on a journey to transform only the finest ingredients into a simply extraordinary ice cream experience. To create these delicious ice cream bars, we dip our smooth vanilla ice cream in a rich coating made with HÄAGEN-DAZS chocolate.














 


 














EXTRÄAZ Cookie Dough Dynamo Ice Cream




Take indulgence to the next level with HÄAGEN-DAZS exträaz Cookie Dough Dynamo Ice Cream. We’ve infused our decadently distinct HÄAGEN-DAZS ice cream with textured ingredients, bringing you a unique experience that will satisfy your richest cravings.














 


 














EXTRÄAZ Chocolate Caramel Brownie Ice Cream




Indulge in HÄAGEN-DAZS EXTRÄAZ Chocolate Caramel Brownie ice cream—a rich, creamy mix of chocolate and caramel ice cream with chewy fudge brownie pieces and a smooth salted caramel swirl, delivering a flavour sensation that's the ultimate indulgence. Since 1960, HÄAGEN-DAZS has been committed to taking high quality ingredients and transforming them into extraordinary ice cream.














 


 














EXTRÄAZ Cookies Cream Crunch Ice Cream




Indulge in HÄAGEN-DAZS EXTRÄAZ Cookies & Cream Crunch ice cream—a decadent combination of creamy vanilla ice cream with chocolatey cookie pieces plus swirls of chocolatey cookie crumble, delivering a satisfyingly crumbly and crunchy texture that's the ultimate indulgence.

Mango Raspberry Ice Cream Bars




Mango-licious! Indulge in the irresistible taste of HÄAGEN-DAZS Mango Raspberry ice cream bars. Sweet mango ice cream with ripples of raspberry is dipped in a coating made with milk chocolate for a tropically inspired treat! Each box of HÄAGEN-DAZS Mango Raspberry ice cream bars comes with 3 individually wrapped bars, just right for sharing with friends and family.














 


 














Strawberries and Cream Ice Cream Bars




Strawberry delight! Indulge in the irresistible taste of HÄAGEN-DAZS Strawberries and Cream ice cream bars. Creamy strawberry ice cream is dipped in a coating made with milk chocolate for a delicious treat. Each box of HÄAGEN-DAZS Strawberries and Cream ice cream bars comes with 3 individually wrapped bars, just right for sharing with friends and family.














 


 














Chocolate Hazelnut Ice Cream Bars




Indulge in the irresistible taste of the NEW HÄAGEN-DAZS Chocolate Hazelnut Ice Cream Bars (3 x 88 ml). This unforgettable ice cream features velvety chocolate hazelnut ice cream coated in a rich milk chocolate, hazelnut crunch pieces, and roasted hazelnuts. Each bar is made in Canada with 100% Canadian dairy and crafted using only the finest ingredients with no artificial flavour or colours.














 


 














Caramel Almond Crunch Bars




Indulge in the irresistible taste of HÄAGEN-DAZS Caramel Almond Crunch Ice Cream Bars. Since 1960, our passion has taken us on a journey to transform only the finest ingredients into an extraordinary ice cream experience. Enjoy the rich flavour of caramel, coated in milk chocolate, sugar cone pieces, and roasted almonds.














 


 














Salted Caramel Bars




Indulge in the irresistible taste of a HÄAGEN-DAZS Salted Caramel Ice Cream Bars. Since 1960, our passion has taken us on a journey to transform only the finest ingredients into a simply extraordinary ice cream experience. Our Salted Caramel ice cream is a flavourful combination of creamy caramel, swirled with salted caramel ribbons, and coated in rich milk chocolate.

EXTRÄAZ Layers Salted Caramel Chocolate Ice Cream




Salted caramel and chocolate are delicious on their own, but exceptional together. Take indulgence to the next level with HÄAGEN-DAZS EXTRÄAZ Layers Salted Caramel Chocolate Ice Cream (414 ml). This decadent dessert is layers of indulgence – a sophisticated blend of smooth, salted caramel and chocolate ice cream with caramel sauce and crispy layers made with milk chocolate.














 


 














EXTRÄAZ Layers Berry Explosion Ice Cream




Strawberry and vanilla are delicious on their own, but exceptional together. Take indulgence to the next level with HÄAGEN-DAZS EXTRÄAZ Layers Berry Explosion Ice Cream (414 ml). This decadent dessert is layers of indulgence – a sophisticated blend of smooth, strawberry and vanilla ice cream with raspberry sauce and crispy layers made with dark chocolate.














 


 














EXTRÄAZ Layers Triple Chocolate Ice Cream




White chocolate and milk chocolate are delicious on their own, but exceptional together. Take indulgence to the next level with HÄAGEN-DAZS EXTRÄAZ Layers Triple Chocolate Ice Cream (414 ml). This decadent dessert is layers of indulgence – a sophisticated blend of smooth, white chocolate and chocolate ice cream and crispy layers made with milk chocolate.














 


 














Chocolate Hazelnut Ice Cream




Indulge in the irresistible taste of HAAGEN-DAZS Chocolate Hazelnut Ice Cream (500 ml). This unforgettable ice cream features velvety chocolate hazelnut ice cream with rich ribbons of chocolate hazelnut. Made in Canada with 100% Canadian dairy, this decadent combination is crafted using only the finest ingredients with no artificial flavour or colours.














 


 














Exträaz Caramel Cone Explosion Ice Cream




Take indulgence to the next level with HÄAGEN-DAZS exträaz Caramel Cone Explosion ice cream! This decadent treat features creamy caramel ice cream, almond pralines, and crunchy chocolatey-dipped cone pieces for an extraordinary dessert where each bite is perfectly distinct, caramel-laced, and delicious!
